setting.location: Moscow streets, various locations showing aftermath

characters.appearance: Various Soviet citizens, different ages, confused and disheveled
characters.clothing: Mix of nightclothes and hastily thrown on garments, some missing items
characters.position: Scattered across Moscow streets, some sitting on curbs, others wandering
characters.action: Looking around in confusion, checking empty pockets, comparing stories with neighbors

characters.appearance: Moscow police officers, several visible, official demeanor but also confused
characters.clothing: Standard Soviet police uniforms, caps, notebooks for taking reports
characters.position: Moving through crowds, standing at street corners with clipboards
characters.action: Taking statements from citizens, writing in notebooks, looking skeptical but concerned

scene.mainElements: Moscow street scene with normal morning activities disrupted by confused citizens
scene.details: People examining empty wallets and purses, scattered clothing items in streets, broken windows in some buildings, scorch marks on pavement, normal morning vendors setting up while citizens tell impossible stories
scene.background: Typical Moscow architecture, apartment buildings, shops beginning to open for business, tramlines and normal city infrastructure
scene.atmosphere: Ordinary city trying to return to normal after supernatural disruption, reality reasserting itself while leaving traces of impossible events, citizens attempting to rationalize inexplicable experiences, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide street-level shot capturing multiple confused citizens and normal city life
composition.focus: Contrast between normal morning routine and citizens dealing with supernatural aftermath
composition.depth: Foreground: confused citizens examining empty pockets; middle ground: police taking statements; background: normal Moscow street life continuing despite disruption
